Stock Board

Stock Board web app
Project Description:

This is a small personal project. I though it would be nice to have a board that would show all the stocks that I bought on one page.
I don't have to login or save anything. I can see what is going on in one sight.

My role in this project is UI developer.

Used technologies:

Polygon.io is the data source for this project. To show the data in beutiful charts TradingView charts wrere used. I used Polygon.io TradingView Adapter as an easy way to connect them.

Axios Component for React with child function callback was utilized in this project to render async requests.

I used Bulma css framework for styling.

React-Grid-Layout is a great way to make a grid of elements that are scalable and have drag and drop functionality.

React Resize Detector was used to obtain the size of each chart and save it together with stock name and layout in local storage.
